pkgmetadata.longdescription: Exhaustive Chemical Enumeration for United Formula Annotation // A pipeline to annotate a number of peaks from the IDSL.IPA peaklists using an exhaustive chemical enumeration-based approach. This package can perform elemental composition calculations using following 15 elements : C, B, Br, Cl, K, S, Se, Si, N, H, As, F, I, Na, O, and P.
